ai_feedback.title: Apply to make change to a council flat - Devon - Feedback

feedback.Did the text answer your query?: No, the page didn't provide any guidance or information about how to request permission for flat improvements or the process involved.
feedback.Was there anything that could have been: Yes, it would be clearer if the page directly linked to the relevant forms or guidance on applying for changes to my flat, instead of showing a 'page not found' message.
feedback.Is there any way this text could be impr: The site should ensure that the correct page loads or provide alternative links or contact info so I can easily find out how to request permission for my flat improvements.

ai_issue.title: Apply to make change to a council flat - Devon - Issue

text_improvements.original:
Sorry, we couldn’t find that page. If you entered a web address please check it was correct.
  You can browse from the homepage or use the search box above to find the information you need.
text_improvements.issue: The message lacks guidance or direct links to relevant forms or pages, leading to user frustration and confusion.

text_improvements.original: We will be going forward with the plan next week.
text_improvements.issue: The phrase 'going forward' can be ambiguous; replacing it with 'proceed' would make the statement clearer and more formal.

text_improvements.original: Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions.
text_improvements.issue: This phrasing is somewhat formal and indirect; using a more direct and friendly call to action could improve user understanding and comfort.
